title: Kabsa
description: A flavorful rice dish with meat, vegetables, and aromatic spices, widely enjoyed across the Arab world.

title: Hummus
description: A classic dip made from chickpeas, tahini, garlic, and lemon, served with pita bread or as a side dish.

title: Falafel
description: Deep-fried chickpea or fava bean patties, often served in pita bread with tahini sauce and vegetables.

title: Shawarma
description: Marinated and slow-cooked meat (usually lamb, chicken, or beef) served in a flatbread wrap with garlic sauce.

title: Mansaf
description: A traditional Jordanian dish featuring lamb cooked in a yogurt-based sauce, served with rice and topped with nuts.

title: Tabbouleh
description: A refreshing salad made with finely chopped parsley, tomatoes, mint, onion, and soaked bulgur, dressed in olive oil and lemon juice.

title: Baba Ganoush
description: Roasted eggplant dip blended with tahini, garlic, and lemon juice, often served with pita bread or as a side dish.

title: Mandi
description: A traditional rice and meat dish, typically featuring spiced and roasted meat served over fragrant basmati rice.

title: Kunafa
description: A delectable dessert made with thin noodle-like pastry soaked in sugar syrup, layered with cheese or nuts.

title: Fattoush
description: A colorful salad made with mixed greens, tomatoes, radishes, cucumbers, and crispy pieces of flatbread, dressed in a tangy vinaigrette.
